name: Swipe 'n Bounce
description:
Check out this new game sensation. Just swipe and make platforms for your character to progress upward. See how high you can go. Compete against your friends or the whole world for high score. Collect coins along the way and purchase upgrades to make the game even more fun.

Get it now while it is FREE. This is the unlimited version, there are no ads in the gameplay to distract you.
